snippet: In an apparent bid to reclaim relevance and support, Prime Minister Dmitri A. Medvedev came out in support of the proposed ban in Russia, where close to a third of the population smokes.
abstract: Prime Min Dmitri A Medvedev voices support for proposed ban on public smoking by 2015 in Russia, where close to a third of population smokes; bid appears to be aimed at reclaiming some political relevance at time when many of the initiatives he championed during his tenure as president have been rolled back under Vladimir V Putin.
lead_paragraph: In an apparent bid to reclaim relevance and support, Prime Minister Dmitri A. Medvedev came out in support of the proposed ban in Russia, where close to a third of the population smokes.

headline.seo: Medvedev Calls for Public Smoking Ban by 2015
headline.main: Medvedev Calls for Public Smoking Ban in Russia by 2015
headline.print_headline: Medvedev Calls for Public Smoking Ban in Russia by 2015
